result.eng: It was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ga: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.orig: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.html: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir gur ẛáraiġ siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.

result.html: Bhris tú an dlíYou broke the law.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris tú an dlíYou broke the law.

result.html: Sháraigh an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.

result.eng: There is a law that prohibits this.
result.ga: Tá dlí ann a chuireann cosc air seo
result.orig: Tá dlí ann a chuireann cosc air seo
result.html: Tá dlí ann a chuireann cosc air seoThere is a law that prohibits this.
result.ponchtml: Tá dlí ann a ċuireann cosc air seoThere is a law that prohibits this.

result.ga: Tá sé sin i gcoinne an dlí
result.orig: Tá sé sin i gcoinne an dlí
result.html: Tá sé sin i gcoinne an dlíThat is against the law.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin i gcoinne an dlíThat is against the law.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
